content.question: What is stated about the mountain?

choices.label: It attracts many climbers in the spring.
You can view the sunset from there.
There are plans for future development.
A festival takes place there in autumn.

content.answer: You can view the sunset from there.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
